about_the_game:
The goal for Timing = Everything.

"Convenient and easily controllable timer functionality in scenarios where timing is important."

It's inspiration comes from playing games with timed events. Knowing exactly how long an event has left or when the next one will occur can provide a massive advantage. I struggled to find a tool that could do exactly what I wanted without a whole lot of fuss, so as a fun project I decided to create one for myself and others! 

While this tool is inspired by gaming, it is certainly not limited to use with games only. Use it with anything you want!

Primary Features Overview:

  • Stopwatch and Countdown modes!

  • Create and customize as many clocks as you need!

  • Control them all independently or at the same time using optional keybinds!

  • The application does not have to be "in focus" for the keybinds to work.

  • The "Always on Top" setting (on by default) allows for overlay.

  • Save and Load Profiles!

  • Saving a profile stores each clock and it's position, colors, keybinds, name, etc.

  • Exportable Lap Log with optional keybind!

  • Pick your own MP3 or WAV file to play when the countdown reaches zero!

  • Snapping - Clocks can snap together and be dragged in a group! *

  • Too small? The scale slider allows you to make everything larger and easier to see.

  • Colors - Use literal color names ("gold, cyan, blue") or hex values in the color fields! **

  • Fruit and Vegetable clocks! New clocks are automatically assigned a random fruit or vegetable name along with a corresponding color.

* Holding shift while dragging a clock will unsnap it from it's group.

** Colors are applied to a darker metallic background, thus the colors you pick will also turn out a bit darker.
